mapper.sql: id, scores, subjectType, num, batch, isSurvey, isReported
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO gk_user_exam ( scores, subjectType, num, batch, isSurvey, isReported ) VALUES ( #{scores}, #{subjectType}, #{num}, #{batch}, #{isSurvey}, #{isReported} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE gk_user_exam
scores = #{scores},
subjectType = #{subjectType},
num = #{num},
batch = #{batch},
isSurvey = #{isSurvey},
isReported = #{isReported},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE gk_user_exam
scores = #{map.scores},
subjectType = #{map.subjectType},
num = #{map.num},
batch = #{map.batch},
isSurvey = #{map.isSurvey},
isReported = #{map.isReported},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gk_user_exam ( scores, subjectType, num, batch, isSurvey, isReported ) VALUES ( #{map.scores}, #{map.subjectType}, #{map.num}, #{map.batch}, #{map.isSurvey}, #{map.isReported} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM gk_user_exam
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{id} , '%')
AND scores like CONCAT('%', #{scores} , '%')
AND subjectType like CONCAT('%', #{subjectType} , '%')
AND num like CONCAT('%', #{num} , '%')
AND batch like CONCAT('%', #{batch} , '%')
AND isSurvey like CONCAT('%', #{isSurvey} , '%')
AND isReported like CONCAT('%', #{isReported} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
